edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.epub
Class HTMLDocumentFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.epub.HTMLDocumentFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
nl.siegmann.epublib.browsersupport.NavigationEventListener
public class HTMLDocumentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements nl.siegmann.epublib.browsersupport.NavigationEventListener

Creates swing HTML documents from resources. Between books the init(Book) function needs to be called in order for images to appear correctly.

Author:
paul.siegmann This class written by Paul Siegmann and taken from the EpubLib software project. See http://www.siegmann.nl/epublib

getDocument

public javax.swing.text.html.HTMLDocument getDocument(nl.siegmann.epublib.domain.Resource resource)
Get the HTMLDocument representation of the resource. If the resource is not an XHTML resource then it returns null. It first tries to get the document from the cache. If the document is not in the cache it creates a document from the resource and adds it to the cache.

Parameters:
resource -
Returns:

removeControlTags

private static java.lang.String removeControlTags(java.lang.String input)

Parameters:
input -
Returns:

createDocument

private javax.swing.text.html.HTMLDocument createDocument(nl.siegmann.epublib.domain.Resource resource)
Creates a swing HTMLDocument from the given resource. If the resources is not of type XHTML then null is returned.
